Method Detail

swap

boolean swap(K key,
             K... keys)
             throws GridException
Swaps cache entries with given keys.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.
Parameters:
key - Key of the entry to swap.
keys - Optional additional keys to swap.
Returns:
true if at least one key was swapped.

swap

void swap(K key,
          V val)
          throws GridException
Swaps given key-value pair. If entry is cached, then it's value will be overridden with with provided value before moving it to swap storage.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.
Parameters:
key - Key to store in swap.
val - Value to store in swap.

swapAll

void swapAll(GridPredicate<GridCacheEntry<K,V>>... p)
             throws GridException
Iterates through all entries in cache and swaps the ones that pass provided predicates. If predicate is not provided, then all cached entries will be swapped.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.
Parameters:
p - Optional predicate(s) to select cached entries to swap.

swapAll

void swapAll(Map<K,V> map)
             throws GridException
Swaps all provided key-value pairs. If any of the keys are currently cached, then their values will be overridden with provided values prior to moving them to swap.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.
Parameters:
map - Key-value pairs to swap.

swapBackups

void swapBackups()
                 throws GridException
Swaps all entries in cache that serve as backups for other entries.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.

takeSwapSnapshot

@GridEnterpriseFeature
GridCacheSwapSpace<K,V> takeSwapSnapshot()
                                         throws GridException
Creates snapshot of the current state of swap storage. Snapshot name will be constructed as follows: "cacheName-{MMDDYY-mmss}", where M is month, D is day, Y is year, and m is minutes and s is seconds.

The GridCacheSwapSpace.readonly() flag on returned swap snapshot is set to true.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.
Returns:
Snapshot name.

swapSnapshots

@GridEnterpriseFeature
Collection<GridCacheSwapSpace<K,V>> swapSnapshots()
Gets read-only collection of currently available swap snapshots. Note that you can still delete any of the snapshots by calling GridCacheSwapSpace.delete() method.

Returns:
Read-only collection of currently available snapshots.

swapspace

@GridEnterpriseFeature
GridCacheSwapSpace<K,V> swapspace()
Provides a view on swap storage. All method on the map will write-through or read-through to/from underlying swap storage. The map supports two iteration orders, ascending or descending, based on the latest timestamp of the swapped entry.

The GridCacheSwapSpace.readonly() flag on returned swap snapshot is set to false.

Returns:
View on the underlying swap store.

swapSnapshot

@GridEnterpriseFeature
GridCacheSwapSpace<K,V> swapSnapshot(String name)
Provides read-onlhy view on a given swap store snapshot. This method is similar to GridCacheSwapApi.swapspace() method, except that it provides a view over swap snapshot taken before and not over current swap store.

The GridCacheSwapSpace.readonly() flag on returned swap snapshot is set to true.

Parameters:
name - Snapshot name.
Returns:
View on the specified swap snapshot.

deleteSwapSnapshots

@GridEnterpriseFeature
boolean deleteSwapSnapshots()
                            throws GridException
Deletes all swap snapshots. To delete individual snapshot, get it from GridCacheSwapApi.swapSnapshot(String) method and call GridCacheSwapSpace.delete() on it.

Throws:
GridException - If failed.
Returns:
True if all snapshots were deleted.
